markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fey Disguise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2638) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sprite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=238" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can disguise yourself with magical illusions. You can cast [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) once per day as a 1st-level primal innate spell. At 7th level, the spell is heightened to 2nd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the spell is heightened an additional spell level.
name: Fey Disguise

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Fey Disguise Source Ancestry Guide pg. 131 2.0 --- You can disguise yourself with magical illusions. You can cast illusory disguise once per day as a 1st-level primal innate spell. At 7th level, the spell is heightened to 2nd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the spell is heightened an additional spell level.
